text: Thomas William Mitchinson (24 February 1943 – 2006) was an English professional footballer who played as a midfielder for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2006 deaths Category:People from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Torquay United F.C. players Category:AFC Bournemouth players Category:English Football League players
title: Tommy Mitchinson
